context_of_use: This use case allows an admin to view sales reports to monitor business performance.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Monitor business performance through sales reports.
description: Enables admins to view sales reports to monitor business performance.
triggering_event: Admin requests to view sales reports.
preconditions: Admin is logged into the system.
Admin has the necessary permissions to view sales reports.
postconditions: Sales reports are displayed to the admin.
assumptions: The admin has access to the sales reporting functionality.
Sales reports are available for viewing.
requirements_met: The system shall allow admins to view sales reports.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of sales reports available for viewing.
main_flow: 1. Admin requests to view sales reports → System displays available sales reports.
2. Admin selects a specific sales report → System retrieves and displays the selected sales report.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If no sales reports are available, then the system displays a message indicating that no reports are available.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the admin does not have permission to view sales reports, then the system displays an error message.
